member_type.name: member_type
member_type.description: Type of membership of the user

duration.name: duration
duration.description: Duration of the trip in seconds

start_station_uuid.name: start_station_uuid
start_station_uuid.description: Unique identifier for the start station

end_station_uuid.name: end_station_uuid
end_station_uuid.description: Unique identifier for the end station

bike_uuid.name: bike_uuid
bike_uuid.description: Unique identifier for the bike used in the trip

station_uuid_start.name: station_uuid_start
station_uuid_start.description: Unique identifier for the start station

original_station_id_start.name: original_station_id_start
original_station_id_start.description: Original identifier for the start station

zip_code_uuid_start.name: zip_code_uuid_start
zip_code_uuid_start.description: Zip code of the start station

station_uuid_end.name: station_uuid_end
station_uuid_end.description: Unique identifier for the end station

original_station_id_end.name: original_station_id_end
original_station_id_end.description: Original identifier for the end station

zip_code_uuid_end.name: zip_code_uuid_end
zip_code_uuid_end.description: Zip code of the end station

trip_duration_category.name: trip_duration_category
trip_duration_category.description: Category of the trip duration, 0-short ( < 300 sec), 1-medium (300-600 sec), 2-long (> 600 sec)

hour_of_day.name: hour_of_day
hour_of_day.description: Hour of the day when the trip started

day_of_week.name: day_of_week
day_of_week.description: Day of the week when the trip started, 0 (Monday) to 6 (Sunday)

is_weekend.name: is_weekend
is_weekend.description: Indicates whether the trip started on a weekend (true) or not (false)

month.name: month
month.description: Month when the trip started, 1 (January) to 12 (December)

season.name: season
season.description: Season when the trip started, Winter, Spring, Summer, Fall

distance_km.name: distance_km
distance_km.description: Distance of the trip in kilometers

average_speed_kmh.name: average_speed_kmh
average_speed_kmh.description: Average speed during the trip in kilometers per hour

trip_distance_category.name: trip_distance_category
trip_distance_category.description: Category of the trip distance, 0-short (< 2 km), 1-medium (2-4 km), 2-long (> 4 km)
